person.persName: Jesse Franklin Hammon (Jefferson County, Kentucky, ship carpenter and policeman)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, ship carpenter and policeman. Son of John Hammon and Mildred Ann Morgan Hammon. Married to Martha Ann Paget Hammon in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on March 20, 1842. Father of Virginia Hammon, Charles Hammon, Edward Hammon, and Fannie Hammon. Ship carpenter in Jefferson County in 1850. Policeman in Louisville in 1859. Served in Thurston’s Guards (U.S.A.) as a captain from September 17, 1862, to September 28, 1862.
